nodes.title: Updated nav drawer visual style, simplified settings activity, better saving of state across configuration changes
Fixed vertical team numbers in landscape
Working implementation of image grid for team media!
Fixed bug with message on loading screen
Fix #157 "Can't switch to any event year after..."
use gradle 0.12 so the project will open into AS
Extra multi-team key check for offseason events.
Sorts events in a given week by name, not date
Don't show progress spinners on refreshes after the first load
Multiple robots on a team at event fix
Properly handle rotation changes in HomeActivity
ViewTeamActivity now properly loads the years participated
Up/back navigation should now work properly
Filter for both www and not-www URLs
Open TBA Web Links in App
Reimplemented team list using a cursor for better performance
Extra ways to hide soft keyboard after searching
Fixed UnsupportedOperationException when viewing  past events
Use new APIv2 paginated team list. Fixes #106

Event Team list links to both team@event and team details
Fixed problem with list item click listeners.
Fix for event deserializers breaking when no "short_name" was specified
Add apk release bits to build.gradle
Added list of open-source licenses in the Settings activity
Save fragment state upon view recreation
Dropdown Spinner color to match action bar.
onPostExecute stress fix + settings strings tweak
Move creation of API Header to constants class.
Enable generic URLs for ping/broadcast notifications
Updated py script formatting and naming for consistency

Workaround Google Play Service Analytics issue 784
Change event rankings to properly handle ####B team numbers. Fixes #530.
Switch to using the Support Library dialogs

Changed how warning messages are handled and displayed.

Reuse code to render mytba items
Fix myTBA preference, bump platform/libarary versions

Fixed issue where events lists weren't being bound
Fixes #459; improves behavior of team year selection

Use event short name from API
Send client name when registering for GCM

Use RecyclerView for Team@Event Summary List

Fixed crash/bug introduced when I fixed match up/back navigation

Make notification text more consistent and readable

Use scaled image sizes for imgur media

simplify the preference code and fix 2 minor bugs
